com.picocontainer.gems.behaviors

Class HotSwapping.HotSwappable<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.picocontainer.behaviors.AbstractBehavior.AbstractChangedBehavior<T>
      • com.picocontainer.gems.behaviors.AsmImplementationHiding.AsmHiddenImplementation<T>
        • com.picocontainer.gems.behaviors.HotSwapping.HotSwappable<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.picocontainer.ChangedBehavior<T>, com.picocontainer.ComponentAdapter<T>, com.picocontainer.ComponentLifecycle<T>, com.picocontainer.ComponentMonitorStrategy, com.picocontainer.LifecycleStrategy, Serializable, org.objectweb.asm.Opcodes
    Enclosing class:
    HotSwapping

    public static class HotSwapping.HotSwappable<T>
extends AsmImplementationHiding.AsmHiddenImplementation<T>
    This component adapter makes it possible to hide the implementation of a real subject (behind a proxy). If the key of the component is of type Class and that class represents an interface, the proxy will only implement the interface represented by that Class. Otherwise (if the key is something else), the proxy will implement all the interfaces of the underlying subject. In any case, the proxy will also implement Swappable, making it possible to swap out the underlying subject at runtime.

    Note that this class doesn't cache instances. If you want caching, use a Caching.Cached around this one.

    Author:
    Paul Hammant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
